trans-unit.source: deleted the /install folder
trans-unit.target: mapa /install je izbrisana

trans-unit.source: renamed the /admin folder (e.g. %s)
trans-unit.target: Preimenovano v /skrbniška mapa (e.g. %s)

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you cannot connect to the back office until you have:
trans-unit.target: Iz varnostnih razlogov, se ne morete povezati v back-office dokler nimate:

trans-unit.source: You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.
trans-unit.target: Preusmerjeni boste na prijavno stran v nekaj sekundah.

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox.
trans-unit.target: Preverite svojo e-pošto.

trans-unit.source: Please then access this page by the new URL (e.g. %s)
trans-unit.target: Nato prosimo, da stran odprete z novim URL (e.g. %s)

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you must also delete the /install folder.
trans-unit.target: Iz varnostnih razlogov morate odstraniti tudi / namestitveno mapo.

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. However, your IP is allowed to enter unsecure mode for maintenance or local IP issues.
trans-unit.target: SSL je aktiviran. Vendar vašemu IP-ju je dovoljen nevarovan način (Vzdrževanje ali lokalni IP).

trans-unit.source: SSL is activated. Please connect using the following link to [1]log in to secure mode (https://)[/1]
trans-unit.target: SSL je omogočen. Za povezavo uporabite sedeč link za [1]varno prijavo (https://)[/1]

trans-unit.source: This employee does not manage the shop anymore (either the shop has been deleted or permissions have been revoked).
trans-unit.target: Ta uslužbenec več ne upravlja te trgovine (Ali je bila trgovina odstranjena ali pa so mu bila pooblastila odvzeta).

trans-unit.source: Some identification information is missing.
trans-unit.target: Manjkajo nekateri indentifikacijsi podatki.

trans-unit.source: The password is missing: please enter your new password.
trans-unit.target: Manjka geslo: prosimo vnesite novo geslo.

trans-unit.source: The password is not in a valid format.
trans-unit.target: Geslo ni v veljavnem formatu.

trans-unit.source: The confirmation is empty: please fill in the password confirmation as well.
trans-unit.target: Polje potrditve je prazno: prosimo vpišite geslo tudi v potrditveno polje.

trans-unit.source: This account does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Ta račun ne obstaja.
trans-unit.note: Line: 437 Comment: check matching employee id with its email

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to change your password.
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do napake pri poskusu spreminjanja vašega gesla.

trans-unit.source: The employee does not exist, or the password provided is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Zaposleni ne obstaja, ali pa je vnešeno geslo napačno.

trans-unit.source: You can reset your password every %interval% minute(s) only. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Vaše geslo lahko ponastavite samo vsakih %interval% minut. Prosimo poskušajte po poteku tega časa.

trans-unit.source: Please, check your mailbox. A link to reset your password has been sent to you.
trans-unit.target: Prosim, preverite vašo dohodno pošto. Poslana vam je bila povezava za ponastavitev gesla.
trans-unit.note: Line: 152 Comment: to find out the employee's emails via brute force.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while attempting to reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do napake pri poskusu ponastavitve vašega gesla.

trans-unit.source: Your password reset request expired. Please start again.
trans-unit.target: Vaša ponastavitev gesla je potekla. Prosimo poženite jo še enkrat.
trans-unit.note: Line: 193 Comment: Display generic error message with no details why it failed

trans-unit.source: The password has been changed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Vaše geslo je bilo uspešno spremenjeno.
